location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench, Dymoke Lyster, and George Skipp, East India Company Agent and council at Bussora [Basra], to William Bowyear and John Sebastian Natter, East India Company Resident and factor at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter expresses doubt about the Resident's fears of attack by Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna] and discusses the negative consequences of keeping a cruizer at Bushire for protection, arguing that it would make it difficult to remain neutral in the disputes between the Caun [Karim Khan] and the Mīr.
